name: Sector 10 Signal Relay
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Within Sector10, you need to collect items to spawn the bosses of the zone. This is what you need to gather: #L "Broken and Powerless Signal Amplifier" "284280" x 4 #L "Kyr'ozch Fuel Gland" "284284" x 4 #L "Inert Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay" "284285" #L "XXX Compiler Unit" "284298" Note: There are 4 different Compilers to be found (Alpha, Kappa, Rho and Sigma) and you will only ever need 1 of each. #L "XXX Crystal - Left Fragment" "284295" Note: There are 4 different Left Fragments, you will need 1 for each boss (Alpha, Kappa, Rho and Sigma) #L "XXX Crystal - Right Fragment" "284296" #Note: There are 4 different Right Fragments, you will need 1 for each boss (Alpha, Kappa, Rho and Sigma) ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Broken and Powerless Signal Amplifier + Broken and Powerless Signal Amplifier = #L "Broken and Powerless Signal Amplifier" "284281" Skill: | 625 ME | Broken and Powerless Signal Amplifier + Broken and Powerless Signal Amplifier = #L "Broken and Powerless Signal Amplifier" "284282" Skill: | 625 ME | Broken and Powerless Signal Amplifier + Broken and Powerless Signal Amplifier = #L "Powerless Signal Amplifier" "284283" Skill: | 625 ME | ------------------------------ Kyr'ozch Fuel Gland + Inert Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay = #L "Inert Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay" "284286" Skill: | 625 EE | Kyr'ozch Fuel Gland + Inert Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay = #L "Inert Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay" "284287" Skill: | 625 EE | Kyr'ozch Fuel Gland + Inert Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay = #L "Inert Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay" "284288" Skill: | 625 EE | Kyr'ozch Fuel Gland + Inert Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay = #L "Powered Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay" "284289" Skill: | 625 EE | ------------------------------ Powerless Signal Amplifier + Powered Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay = #L "Untuned Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay" "284290" Skill: | 625 EE | ------------------------------ XXX Crystal - Left Fragment + XXX Crystal - Right Fragment = #L "XXX Tuning Crystal" "284297" Skill: | 625 NP | XXX Tuning Crystal + XXX Compiler Unit = #L "XXX Tuning Unit - Inactive" "284433" Skill: | 687 NP | Note: right clicking activates the Tuning Unit but also makes it NODROP Untuned Kyr'ozch Teleportation Relay + XXX Tuning Unit = #L "XXX Signal Relay" "284291"
